GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

topics.description: The man, the Mitch, the legend

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a single user object containing: 'username', 'avatar_url' and 'name'

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves a single article object containing: 'author', 'title', 'body', 'topic', 'created_at', 'votes' and 'comment_count'

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: accepts object in the form { inc_votes: 1 }, { inc_votes: -1 }. And serves an updated article object

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: accepts object in the form {username: 'butter_bridge',body: 'This is a new test comment :)'}. And serves the new comment object

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: This is a new test comment :)

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics
